text: Gudha is a village in the Bhiwani district of the Indian state of Haryana. Located in the Tosham tehsil, it lies approximately west of the district headquarters town of Bhiwani. , the village had 559 households with a total population of 2,959 of which 1,595 were male and 1,394 female. ==References== Category:Villages in Bhiwani district
title: Gudha, Bhiwani
